paper.title: FACTOR GRAPH SWITCHING PORTFOLIOS UNDER TRANSACTION COSTS
paper.abstract: We consider the sequential portfolio investment problem. Building on results in signal processing, machine learning, and other areas, we use factor graphs to develop new universal portfolio algorithms for switching strategies under transaction costs. These algorithms make use of a transition diagram in order to compactly represent and compute message passing on an exponentially increasing number of factor graphs. We compare this with a previous universal switching portfolios, demonstrating typically superior performance.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究的是序列投资组合问题，并开发了新的通用投资组合算法，用于在交易成本下进行策略切换。这直接涉及投资组合管理的核心问题，即如何在考虑交易成本的情况下优化投资组合的配置和调整。
